assistance.title: Continuous Assistance
assistance.description: Continuous assistance is an integral part of my approach aimed at treating the body as a whole, not just the isolated problem. This service is essential to ensuring my patients' long-term health and well-being.

therapy.title: Treatment and Therapy
therapy.description: I strive to understand the root of your problem to provide you with the most effective treatment. Over the years, I have found that treatment and therapy are fundamental elements in the recovery process.

health.title: Assessment and Diagnosis
health.description: I listen to your story and create a detailed file. I then develop a personalized treatment plan that includes assessment and diagnosis, aimed at achieving the functional results we have set together.

aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.description: Dr. Francesco Luise is a renowned physiotherapist with a passion for helping people achieve their goals. He is a certified professional with a specialization in sports physiotherapy and a member of the National Board of Physiotherapists.

firstwork.title: Physiotherapist
firstwork.institution: Specialized clinics in Mogliano Veneto (TV) and Mestre (VE)

contacts.title: Contacts

name.label: Name
name.error: Name must be at least 2 characters.

email.label: Email
email.error: Please enter a valid email address.

phone.label: Phone
phone.error: Please enter a valid phone number.

contacts.whatsapp: Hello Dr. Francesco Luise, I would like to get more information about your physiotherapy services. Can we schedule an appointment?
